movies.title: Spiderman Into the Spider-verse
movies.description: Bitten by a radioactive spider in the subway, Brooklyn teenager Miles Morales suddenly develops mysterious powers that transform him into the one and only Spider-Man. When he meets Peter Parker, he soon realizes that there are many others who share his special, high-flying talents. Miles must now use his newfound skills to battle the evil Kingpin, a hulking madman who can open portals to other universes and pull different versions of Spider-Man into our world.

reviews.title: The best superhero animation ever
reviews.description: This 2018 American computer-animated superhero film is one of the most solid animations which aren’t made by Disney or Pixar in a long, long time. Here’s my reasons for why this film deserves all the accolades it has received.
